function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on unverified data sources for research","Impact":"Inaccurate or misleading information in research and publications","Mitigation":"Verify data from multiple reliable sources before using it for analysis","Technologies":"Data validation and verification tools","People":"Researchers, authors, and publishers","Owner":"Research institutions and publishing organizations"},{"Description":"Potential spread of misinformation through microblog and WeChat","Impact":"Misinformation leading to public confusion and misconception about pandemic prevention","Mitigation":"Promote fact-checking and critical evaluation of information shared on microblog and WeChat","Technologies":"Social media monitoring and fact-checking tools","People":"Users of microblog and WeChat, general public","Owner":"Social media platforms, fact-checking organizations"},{"Description":"Public perception of 5G technology and pandemic prevention","Impact":"Misperception leading to resistance or distrust of 5G technology for pandemic prevention","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns and transparent communication about the role of 5G in pandemic prevention","Technologies":"Public awareness campaigns and communication platforms","People":"General public, policymakers, and stakeholders","Owner":"Government agencies, communication organizations"}]}
